name: Honey Buttered Brie en Croute
author: erinshelly
summary: Baked en croute with honey, butter, and slivered almonds, brie is perfect for a get-together with friends. Serve directly out of the oven with table crackers or crusty bread... and some wine!
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) round brie, sliced in half horizontally
2 tablespoons butter, or more as needed
2 tablespoons honey, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Dust a pastry mat with flour
Roll out the puff pastry into a 1/4-inch sheet with a rolling pin
Place 1/2 of the brie on the puff pastry, rind side-down
Trim off the corners of the pastry with a knife
Dab the top of the brie with 2 tablespoons almonds and 1 tablespoon butter
Cover with the other half of brie, rind side-up
Top with the remaining almonds, butter, and honey
Wrap the puff pastry around the wheel of brie, sealing the seams by pinching them together
Place brie en croute in a baking pan
Bake in the preheated oven until pastry is golden brown, 45 to 50 minutes
